o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_BusinessRuleAttribute
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that every business rule attribute has a stereotype assigned.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following business rule attributes have no (correct) stereotype set:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript: Function %Check%(obj) ' Check whether the attribute has a business rule attribute stereotype. %Check% = obj.HasStereotype("mdde_BusinessRuleAttribute") End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
